name: MeasurePopulationSystem
title: Measure Population System
description: A Code System for Populations defined by The SANER Project

concept.display: All Hospital Beds
concept.definition: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds, including all staffed,ICU, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients or outpatients

concept.display: Hospital Inpatient Beds
concept.definition: Inpatient beds, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow (surge) beds used for inpatients

concept.display: Hospital Inpatient Bed Occupancy
concept.definition: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are occupied

concept.display: ICU Beds
concept.definition: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds

concept.display: ICU Bed Occupancy
concept.definition: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied

concept.display: Mechanical Ventilators
Mechanical Ventilators in Use
concept.definition: Total number of ventilators in use

concept.display: All COVID-19 Confirmed or Suspected Patients
concept.definition: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 in any location.

concept.display: Hospitalized COVID-19 Patients
concept.definition: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19

concept.display: ED/Overflow COVID-19 Patients
concept.definition: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed

concept.display: Hospital Onset COVID-19 Patients
concept.definition: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID-19 14 or more days after hospitalization

concept.display: Ventilated COVID-19 Patients
concept.definition: Patients in any location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator

concept.display: Hospitalized and Ventilated COVID-19 Patients
concept.definition: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19 and are on a mechanical ventilator

concept.display: ED/Overflow and Ventilated COVID-19 Patients
concept.definition: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator

concept.display: COVID-19 Patient Deaths
concept.definition: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED, or any overflow location

concept.display: New Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Received
Cumulative Diagnostic Tests Ordered/Received
New Tests Resulted
Cumulative Specimens Rejected
Cumulative Tests Performed
New Positive COVID-19 Tests
Cumulative Positive COVID-19 Tests
All Laboratory Reports for any Order
Most Recent Laboratory Reports for any Order
